parts.title: Part 1: Match the Root/Prefix/Suffix to Its Meaning

questions.meaning: A suffix that can form nouns or indicate a function or relation.
Suffix meaning pertaining to or related to.
Suffix meaning study of or branch of knowledge.
Suffix indicating a process, action, or state.

parts.title: Part 2: Use the Root/Prefix/Suffix to Guess the Word

questions.definition: Relating to the perception of movement or position of body parts.
A device or system for sending messages over long distances by wire.
The study of water, especially its movement in relation to land.
A specialist in the study of human movement.
The scientific study of the mind and behavior.
The act or process of moving.
The study of the mechanical laws relating to the movement or structure of living organisms.

questions.question: Write a sentence using one HYPER word, one TELE word, and one -ICS word.
questions.example: The hyperactive child watched the dynamic action scene on the television, fascinated by the energy of the characters.

questions.question: Can you think of another word with one of the parts? Guess what it might mean.
questions.example: Kinesthetic might mean relating to the perception of body movement, as 'kinesio' refers to motion and 'thetic' refers to perception.
